Up.Statement:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT mail_id FROM [w2_MailTemplate] WHERE shop_id = '0' AND mail_id = N'10000082') BEGIN INSERT INTO [w2_MailTemplate] ( w2_MailTemplate.shop_id, w2_MailTemplate.mail_id, w2_MailTemplate.mail_name, w2_MailTemplate.mail_from, w2_MailTemplate.mail_to, w2_MailTemplate.mail_cc, w2_MailTemplate.mail_bcc, w2_MailTemplate.mail_subject, w2_MailTemplate.mail_body, w2_MailTemplate.mail_subject_mobile, w2_MailTemplate.mail_body_mobile, w2_MailTemplate.mail_attachmentfile_path, w2_MailTemplate.del_flg, w2_MailTemplate.date_created, w2_MailTemplate.date_changed, w2_MailTemplate.last_changed, w2_MailTemplate.mail_from_name, w2_MailTemplate.mail_category, w2_MailTemplate.auto_send_flg ) VALUES ( '0', '10000082', '外部連携エラー', 'bh@w2s.xyz', '', '', '', '外部連携エラー', '@@ message @@', '', '', '', '0', GETDATE(), GETDATE(), '', '', '', '1' ) END GO
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT extend_status_no FROM [w2_OrderExtendStatusSetting] WHERE shop_id = '0' AND extend_status_no = 37) BEGIN INSERT INTO [w2_OrderExtendStatusSetting] ( [shop_id], [extend_status_no], [extend_status_name], [extend_status_discription], [date_created], [date_changed], [last_changed] ) VALUES ( '0', 37, '【システム使用】受注外部連携済みフラグ', '', GETDATE(), GETDATE(), 'ｗ２ユーザー' ) END GO
